explanation:
The correct calculation adds the "4x4 only" and intersection values: 27 (only 4x4) + 15 (both 4x4 and Black Car) = 42 total 4x4 owners.  
The student likely stopped at the "4x4 only" value (27), excluding the intersection.  
This error stems from misinterpreting the Venn diagram's regions: the question asks for all 4x4 owners (full circle), but the student counted only the exclusive portion.  
The misconception reflects a failure to recognize that set totals in Venn diagrams require combining exclusive and overlapping regions.  
This differs from giving the intersect value itself (15) or mixing set labels, as the error specifically isolates the exclusive region instead of aggregating all relevant values.  
The missing 10 people outside both circles (60 - 27 -15 -8 = 10) are irrelevant here, ruling out total inclusion errors.
